word_mean: 临床的，临证的：关于临床或病床边的
有别于理论或基础科学的，对患者的实际观察及治疗的，或以其为依据的

sentence.Network_en: They have been treated with this drug in clinical trials.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们已在临床试验中接受过这种药物的治疗。

sentence.Network_en: Tell me about your clinical trials. How did they go?
sentence.Network_cn: 跟我说说你的临床试验。进展如何？

sentence.Network_en: All this questioning is so analytical and clinical — it kills romance.
sentence.Network_cn: 整个询问分析性和逻辑性太强，浪漫的气息荡然无存。

临床营养(clinical nutrition)：中小分子的营养素——水、氨基酸、电解质、维生素、微量元素、糖、脂肪。

临床试验（clinical trial）(Clinical Trial)，指任何在人体(病人或健康志愿者)进行药物的系统性研究，以证实或揭示试验药物的作用、不良反应及/或试 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from Greek klinikē 'bedside' (see clinic) + -al

entry.def: Clinical means involving or relating to the direct medical treatment or testing of patients.

example.ex: The first clinical trials were expected to begin next year.
example.tran: 第一批临床实验有望明年开始。

entry.tran: （思想、行为）非常符合逻辑的，不带感情的
entry.def: You use clinical to describe thought or behaviour which is very logical and does not involve any emotion.

example.ex: All this questioning is so analytical and clinical — it kills romance.
example.tran: 整个询问分析性和逻辑性太强，浪漫的气息荡然无存。

means.word_mean: 1. relating to a clinic or conducted in or as if in a clinic and depending on direct observation of patients;

sentences.sentence: "he spoke in the clipped clinical monotones typical of police testimony"

auth_sentence.content: We need clinical trials that take this into account.
auth_sentence.res_content: We need clinical trials that take this into account.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We need clinical trials that take this into account.

auth_sentence.content: It is currently in development as a clinical therapy.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is currently in development as a clinical therapy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is currently in development as a clinical therapy.

auth_sentence.content: Now, clinical trials in people are under way.
auth_sentence.res_content: Now, clinical trials in people are under way.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Now, clinical trials in people are under way.

Sentence.sentence: Those who stay on for an additional two years can earn a master's degree that qualifies them as nurse practitioners (执业护士) or clinical nurse specialists.

sentences.en: These data show that most cancers are detected as a result of clinical follow-up.
sentences.cn: 这些数据表明多数癌症是由临床随访查出来的。

sentences.en: They are doing clinical trials on a new drug.
sentences.cn: 他们正在做一种新药物的临床试验。

sentences.en: After the clinical examination,the consultant invited his students to put forward any suggestions they had kicked about the nature of the disease.
sentences.cn: 临床检查完毕,会诊医师就请学生提出个人对该病性质的诊断意见。
